short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display a quote on a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Profound Chrome Extension is designed to inspire and engage users every time they open a new browser tab. It features a collection of profound quotes from various authors, offering users a moment of reflection and motivation. Each quote is elegantly displayed against a visually appealing background, enhancing the user's browsing experience.

Key features include:

A vast library of thought-provoking quotes that randomly display on each new tab.

Easy-to-use Copy and Email buttons, allowing users to share their favorite quotes instantly.

A convenient settings menu, featuring a link to suggest new quotes, fostering a sense of community involvement.

Aesthetic and minimalist design that complements the modern user interface, with smooth transitions and hover effects for a premium feel.

This extension is perfect for those seeking daily inspiration, a mental refresh, or a touch of elegance in their digital workspace. Its unobtrusive yet impactful design makes it a must-have for professionals, students, creatives, and anyone looking to enrich their browsing experience with meaningful content.
